content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we can start the negotiation. Let's focus on the rental price for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I believe we can find a suitable price that works for both of us. Currently considering the location and amenities of this 50 square meter apartment, I'd like to propose a starting point of 550 Euros per month as a rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I disagree with your proposal. I think we can start higher considering the prime location of the apartment. How about 700 Euros per month as a starting point?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for hearing me out but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment because your suggested price seems significantly higher than what I had in mind, considering my budget constraints.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand, Yi-Nuo Wang. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your budget is lower than what I had in mind for the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
